exampleEn: The company announced its quarterly earnings yesterday.
We are interested in forming a partnership with you.
exampleKo: 우리는 귀하와 파트너십을 맺는 데 관심이 있습니다(관련이 있습니다).

exampleEn: She is an active member of the committee.
He decided to accept the job offer.
Experts foresee a bright future for the industry.
exampleKo: 전문가들은 그 산업의 밝은 미래를 예견합니다.

exampleEn: The expansion of the factory created many jobs.
The company plans to relocate to a larger office.
exampleKo: 그 회사는 더 큰 사무실로 이전할 계획입니다.

exampleEn: We must stay ahead of our competitors.
Our employees are our most valuable asset.
exampleKo: 우리 직원들은 우리의 가장 소중한 자산입니다.

exampleEn: Everyone should contribute to the discussion.
The team is dedicated to customer satisfaction.
exampleKo: 그 팀은 고객 만족에 전념하고 있습니다(헌신적입니다).

exampleEn: I seem to have misplaced my keys.
exampleKo: 제가 열쇠를 잃어버린(위치를 잘못 잡은) 것 같습니다.

exampleEn: The project required a considerable amount of time.
exampleKo: 그 프로젝트는 상당한 양의 시간을 필요로 했습니다.

exampleEn: The meeting is expected to last for two hours.
New markets are emerging in Asia.
The business continues to grow rapidly.
A panel of judges will select the winner.
The two banks agreed to merge next month.
exampleKo: 두 은행은 다음 달에 합병하기로 합의했습니다.

exampleEn: High prices imply that demand is strong.
exampleKo: 높은 가격은 수요가 강하다는 것을 암시합니다(의미합니다).

exampleEn: Trust is vital for a healthy relationship.
If symptoms persist, consult a doctor.
The audit was conducted by an independent firm.
They joined forces to launch the new product.
exampleKo: 그들은 새 제품을 출시하기 위해 세력(힘)을 합쳤습니다.

exampleEn: The company was established in 1990.
We initiated a new project to reduce waste.
exampleKo: 우리는 낭비를 줄이기 위해 새 프로젝트를 착수했습니다(시작했습니다).

exampleEn: This software will enhance your productivity.
exampleKo: 이 소프트웨어는 당신의 생산성을 향상시킬 것입니다.

exampleEn: He is a renowned expert in his field.
Please keep me informed of any changes.
The secretary took the minutes of the meeting.
The bank agreed to waive the processing fee.
exampleKo: 은행은 처리 수수료를 면제해 주기로(포기하기로) 동의했습니다.

exampleEn: We hope to reach an agreement soon.
She has the authority to sign contracts.
The company acquired a smaller rival.
exampleKo: 그 회사는 더 작은 경쟁사를 매입했습니다(인수했습니다).

exampleEn: Sales this year surpassed our expectations.

meaning: ~을 운영하다, 경영하다,, (공연, 영화 등이) 상영되다, 계속되다
exampleEn: She runs her own consulting business.

meaning: 사실이라고 생각할 수 없는, 일어날 것 같지 않은
exampleEn: It is improbable that the price will drop soon.
exampleKo: 가격이 곧 떨어질 것이라는 것은 사실이라고 생각할 수 없습니다(일어날 것 같지 않습니다).

exampleEn: We have a competitive edge over our rivals.
exampleKo: 우리는 경쟁사들보다 경쟁 우위(유리함)를 가지고 있습니다.

exampleEn: The two events happened simultaneously.
The report revealed serious errors in the accounts.
exampleKo: 그 보고서는 계좌에 심각한 오류가 있음을 밝혔습니다.

exampleEn: We are looking for ways to boost productivity.
exampleKo: 우리는 생산성을 높일 방법을 찾고 있습니다.
